channel.title: One shot one kill
channel.description: ok i stuck on one shot one kill on vetren on cod4 and i was wondering if you could give me some tips on doing the last part of were youhave to wait for the hellicopter

item.title: One shot one kill
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:

chears after watching a video on youtube i found a good place and managed to do it

item.title: One shot one kill
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

Stay on the hill and conserve your ammo, use your sniper (until it’s out, then get another weapon). Before the enemies start coming, lay down your claymores in strategic points. Stay near the guy you’re trying to protect.

Yea. It’s a hard part but it’s doable. It took me around 6 tries, so don’t give up.

Read full topic
